name: MonsterHunt
description:
Monster Hunt

The green number tells you how far away the monster is.

Walk and stop in time. Listen to the sound.

Press spacebar when you think you are close enough!

If you are too close the monster kills you.

If you are too far away the monster escapes.

If you are in the range you kill the monster.

Escape to quit game!

CREDITS
